entry.title: RAP Custom Entity Deep associations
entry.content:
Hi there,

I composed a root custom entity Header which has a composition of 1 _to HeaderStart. Custom entity HeaderStart has a 1..* composition of _toLines. And the lines Custom Entity has a composition of _toDeliveryDetails. Custom Entity DeliveryDetails has a composition of one _toAddress Custom Entity.

Header->_toHeaderStart->_toLines->_toDeliveryDetails->_toAddress

i created a class and implemented the if_rap_query_provider. 

In my service i exposed all the entities. I created an odata v4 service

when i test my service via the gateway client I can only expand one level deep.

but i also want to expand to all other compositions but in one call starting from my root custom entity ZCE.

/ZCE(par1=‚Äò1‚Äô,par2=‚Äò2‚Äô)/Set&?expand=_toHeaderStart,_toLines,_toDeliveryDetails,_toAddress

in the debugger i come only two times in the select. But i want to deep nest further. Is this possible with custom entity?

I designed it like this because i need a nested json.

Any help or tips are appreciated.

Kind regards, 

#RAP#CustomEntity #Composition

#associations

entry.title: Requirement to Disable/Hide ‚ÄòPost Goods Issue‚Äô in ME2ON output screen.
entry.content:
Hi ,

 

We have a requirement to hide/disable/suppress the ‚ÄòPost Goods Issue‚Äô option on the output screen of transaction ME2ON.

The business process requires users to perform goods issue only with reference to outbound delivery, and not directly with reference to the PO. Therefore, PGI should not be available in ME2ON.

Key points:

  • Requirement: Hide/disable/suppress PGI field in ME2ON.

  • User will always issue goods with reference to outbound delivery.

  • Creation of a new Z transaction code is not an acceptable option.

Could you please share your inputs or recommended approach to achieve this requirement?

Thanks & Regards,
Manohar

entry.title: How to add entries to transports to delete objects which were deleted in Dev and not in TADIR?
entry.content:
Hi community,
we have created a solution in abap and all development is done in one development-package in our own namespace. We delivered it by creating a transport-request with all objects of that development-package on it.

Now we have a newer version of the solution. But some development-objects where deleted in the development since the first release. We will deliver the software again as a big transport with all development-objects of our development-package on it. 
We create this transport programmatically by selecting all objects from table TADIR for our development-package. Then we use the function-module "TRINT_OBJECTS_CHECK_AND_INSERT" to put all the selected development objects on the transport. 

But this transport now should not contain only all available development-objects. It shell also contain all development-objects which were deleted since the last transport. So we read table "E071" for the transport of the previous release, check all entries if they still exists in TADIR and for all found no longer existing development objects we want a "delete"-entry in the transport request. 
First try was to use the same function module and setting the value for "objfunc" to "D" for deletion. But the Functionmodule seems to check all added entries for existence against TADIR (throws exception "show_only_tadir_missing").

Principally it should work to add such deletion entries to a transport because i saw it in other software-packages we installed by using transports. The E071 for such transport shows also only a value of "D" for Attribute OBJFUNC.

So my question is how to achive this. is there any special parameter in function-module "TRINT_OBJECTS_CHECK_AND_INSERT" or do i have to use another function-module or abap-class/-method?

Any idea would be hardly welcome.
kind regards
Matthias

entry.title: Fiori Flexible Workflow for Purchase Orders - My inbox is empty
entry.content:
Hello everyone

Normally it works that users ( approvers ) have to receive notification in theirs Inbox.  They only receive email notification about approve.

I will be appreciated for any support.

entry.title: Performance Issue in 'ME_INFORECORD_MAINTAIN'
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

Recently, we encountered a performance issue when updating the condition price against the material info record using the BAPI - 'ME_INFORECORD_MAINTAIN'.  

After analysing the info record and BAPI, we found that a particular PIR has a certain number (i.e., 800) of existing condition validity periods due to the customer updating the price on a daily basis as per their business. Inside the BAPI, there is a method 'PROCESS_VAL_PERIODS' and a call function 'PROCESS_VAL_PERIODS' for finding all existing validity periods. This function module has the following subroutine, and it takes time to read that much of validity periods.

PERFORM kon_select IN PROGRAM (maintain_program)
USING t180-aktyp no no.

 It has increased the runtime for updating the price of a single material. Is there any alternate approach to boost the performance of the condition price update.

Many thanks in advance for your help!

entry.title: Performance Issue in BAPI 'ME_INFORECORD_MAINTAIN'
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

Recently, we encountered a performance issue when updating the condition price against the material info record using the BAPI 'ME_INFORECORD_MAINTAIN'.

After analysing the info record details on ME13 and BAPI, the particular PIR has a certain number (i.e., 800) of condition validity periods. Inside BAPI, there are methods 'PROCESS_VAL_PERIODS' and call the function 'COND_MNT_START' to find all existing validity periods.

This function module has the following subroutine, and it takes time to read all existing condition validity periods.

PERFORM kon_select IN PROGRAM (maintain_program)
USING t180-aktyp no no.

It has increased the runtime (30 - 60 secs) to update the condition price for a single material. Is there any alternate approach to boost the performance for price update.

Many thanks in advance for your help!

entry.title: DELINS IDoc: How can system accept different time daily schedule line
entry.content:
We receive inbound DELINS IDoc and for one location, it wants to accept time specific daily schedule lines for SDSA.  Currently, the logic in IDOC_INPUT_DELINS overwrites the existing daily schedule line if the incoming IDoc has the same date even if the time and quantity is different.  In manual VA32 transaction, it allows multiple daily schedule line for the same date and different time.  But not for the inbound IDoc. 

For example, if the SDSA has existing daily schedule line 19.09.2025 time 04:00 with quantity 300 ST, and then IDoc segment field E1EDP16-EDATUV 19.09.2025, E1EDP16-EZEIT 16:00 with quantity E1EDP16-WMENG 150 ST.  The SDSA schedule line will be updated to 19.09.2025 16:00 150 ST.  Our expectation is the SDSA should have 2 daily lines for the date 19.09.2025.

I'm not sure if this is a bug but in case, is there a note on this?  Or can this be solved by customizing or a user-exit/enhancement needs to be implemented in function module IDOC_INPUT_DELINS?

entry.title: Duplicate production entries 101 using BAPI VHURM_HU_POST_WE_PROD_ORDER
entry.content:
Hello experts,

We are working with a custom program that posts production confirmations using the BAPI VHURM_HU_POST_WE_PROD_ORDER, which internally calls transaction COWBHUWE to register production goods receipts in EWM, already packed in HUs (Handling Units).

We're encountering the following issue:

 

‚ùó Unexpected behavior:

In very rare cases, the system is duplicating the 101 movement for a production order. That is, it creates two separate material documents, each with a different batch number, for the same order.

üìå Observations:

  • The duplicated movements occur at exactly the same second, or at most one second apart.
  • This suggests a possible concurrency issue or race condition during execution.

‚öôÔ∏è Technical details:

  • In the it_hulist parameter (which specifies how many 101 movements should be posted), we are explicitly passing only one line.
  • Despite this, in about 2 out of every 500 production orders, a partial production receipt gets duplicated.

‚ùì Question:

Has anyone experienced this kind of duplication using the BAPI VHURM_HU_POST_WE_PROD_ORDER or in similar EWM + HU scenarios?
Do you know how we can prevent this unexpected behavior?

Any help or suggestions would be greatly appreciated.

entry.title: Mail body is shown in SOST but not in the email received in outlook
entry.content:
Hello Team - We can see body of the email in SOST. But when it is delivered to outlook, it doesn't show the body, its empty. Status of these emails in SOST is "Sent" whereas for other emails its "Transmitted". 

SOST:

Outlook:

Please help !

Here is the code I used:

  " Subject of the eMail
  lv_subject = |Work Order Notification - { lv_aufnr }|.

  " Prepare Body of the eMail
  APPEND |<html><body>| TO lt_email_body. " 1st line - HTML Tag Beginning

  IF lwa_jest_old-stat = ''.
	APPEND |Order # { lv_aufnr } is created. <br> <br>| TO lt_email_body.
  ELSE.
	APPEND |Status of the work order # "{ lv_aufnr } - { caufvd_imp-ktext }" is changed from <b> { lwa_tj30t_old-txt30 } </b> to <b> { lwa_tj30t_new-txt30 }</b>. <br> <br>| TO lt_email_body.
  ENDIF.

  APPEND 'Navigate to the Work Order by clicking here: ' TO lt_email_body.

  CASE sy-sysid.
	WHEN 'SND'.
	  DATA(lv_url_start) = 'https://sandboxURL/'.
	WHEN 'DEV'.
	  lv_url_start = 'https://DevURL/'.
	WHEN 'QAS'.
	  lv_url_start = 'https://QAURL/'.
	WHEN 'PRD'.
	  lv_url_start = 'https://ProdURL/'.
  ENDCASE.

  " URL for the order
  DATA(lv_url) = lv_url_start && '<Link to Fiori App>(' &&
  |'{ lv_aufnr }'| && ')/?<Continue Link to Fiori App>'.
  APPEND |<a href="{ lv_url }">| TO lt_email_body.
  APPEND | { lv_aufnr } - { caufvd_imp-ktext } </a><br><br>| TO lt_email_body.

  APPEND |</html></body>| TO lt_email_body. " 1st line - HTML Tag Ending

  TRY.
	  "Create send request
	  lr_send_request = cl_bcs=>create_persistent( ).

	  " Sender Details
	  lr_sender = cl_sapuser_bcs=>create( 'BATCH_USER' ).

	  "Add sender to send request
	  CALL METHOD lr_send_request->set_sender
		EXPORTING
		  i_sender = lr_sender.

	  " Add Created by as 1st receiver
	  SELECT SINGLE ernam FROM qmel INTO @DATA(lv_ernam)
		WHERE qmnum = @caufvd_imp-qmnum.
	  lv_receiver = |{ lv_ernam }@abc.com|.
	  lr_recipient = cl_cam_address_bcs=>create_internet_address( lv_receiver ).
	  "Add Created By to send request
	  CALL METHOD lr_send_request->add_recipient
		EXPORTING
		  i_recipient = lr_recipient
		  i_express   = 'X'.

	  " Also send eMail to tool owner(S)
	  IF NOT lt_tool_owner[] IS INITIAL.
		LOOP AT lt_tool_owner ASSIGNING FIELD-SYMBOL(<fsl_tool_owner>).
		  CLEAR: lv_receiver, lr_recipient.
		  lv_receiver = |{ <fsl_tool_owner>-parnr }@abc.com|.
		  lr_recipient = cl_cam_address_bcs=>create_internet_address( lv_receiver ).
		  "Add recipient(s) to send request
		  CALL METHOD lr_send_request->add_recipient
			EXPORTING
			  i_recipient = lr_recipient
			  i_express   = 'X'.
		ENDLOOP.
	  ENDIF.

	  " Created eMail body
	  lr_document = cl_document_bcs=>create_document(
					   i_type    = 'HTM'
					   i_text    = lt_email_body
					   i_length  = '12'
					   i_subject = lv_subject ).

	  "Add document to send request
	  CALL METHOD lr_send_request->set_document( lr_document ).

	  "Send email
	  CALL METHOD lr_send_request->send(
		EXPORTING
		  i_with_error_screen = 'X'
		RECEIVING
		  result              = lv_sent_to_all ).

	  "Exception handling
	CATCH cx_bcs INTO lr_bcs_exception.
	  MESSAGE e002(zeam) WITH lr_bcs_exception->error_type. " Error in sending eamil notification: &1
  ENDTRY.

Thanks,

Phani

entry.title: ADS job not free memory
entry.content:
Hi all,

I have a requirement to print a form with more than 15.000 pages.

Offcourse that must be done by background job.

If I try to print more than 1000 pages per job I get an error of adobe memory.

I've tried to split on multiple jobs, but the memory is not release and I get the same adobe memory error.

My code is:

FORM f_print_pdf.

  DATA: lt_dtab_pdf TYPE ty_datatab_pdf_t,
        lv_fname    TYPE funcname.

  DATA(lv_tot_lines) = lines( gt_dtab_pdf ).
  DATA(lv_pag_atual) = CONV i( 1 ).

  CALL FUNCTION 'FP_FUNCTION_MODULE_NAME'
    EXPORTING
      i_name     = CONV fpname( 'ZFI_MAP' )
    IMPORTING
      e_funcname = lv_fname.

  WHILE lv_actual_pag LE lv_total_lines.
    REFRESH lt_dtab_pdf.
    LOOP AT gt_dtab_pdf FROM lv_actual_page TO ( lv_actual_page + 999 )
                        ASSIGNING FIELD-SYMBOL(<wa_dtab_pdf>).
      APPEND <wa_dtab_pdf> TO lt_dtab_pdf.
    ENDLOOP.

    PERFORM f_print_pdf_pages USING lv_fname
                                    lv_actual_page
                                    lv_total_lines
                                    lt_dtab_pdf.

    ADD 1000 TO lv_actual_page.
  ENDWHILE.

ENDFORM. " F_PRINT_PDF
FORM f_print_pdf_pages  USING pv_fname        TYPE funcname
                              pv_actual_page  TYPE i
                              pv_total_pages  TYPE i
                              pt_dtab_pdf     TYPE ty_datatab_pdf_t.

  DATA: ls_docparams    TYPE sfpdocparams,
        ls_outputparams TYPE sfpoutputparams,
        ls_formoutput   TYPE fpformoutput,
        ls_result       TYPE sfpjoboutput.

    ls_outputparams-nodialog  = 'X'.
    ls_outputparams-preview   = space.
    ls_outputparams-reqnew    = 'X'.
    ls_outputparams-reqfinal  = 'X'.
    ls_outputparams-covtitle  = sy-cprog.
    ls_outputparams-dest      = 'ZLOC'.

  CALL FUNCTION 'FP_JOB_OPEN'
    CHANGING
      ie_outputparams = ls_outputparams
    EXCEPTIONS
      OTHERS          = 99.

  CHECK sy-subrc EQ 0.

  CALL FUNCTION pv_fname
    EXPORTING
      it_datatab        = pt_dtab_pdf
      iv_gjahr          = CONV gjahr( p_gjahr-low )
    EXCEPTIONS
      OTHERS            = 99.

  CALL FUNCTION 'FP_JOB_CLOSE'
    IMPORTING
      e_result = ls_result
    EXCEPTIONS
      OTHERS = 99.

ENDFORM. " F_PRINT_PDF_PAGES

The first time I do the loop it's ok. The second time I got the error: "Out of Memory Exception Stack Trace: com.adobe.ProcessingException".

Any idea why the FP_JOB_CLOSE doesn't clear the memory?

Thank you

entry.title: Issue connecting custom form to MES | "Form is a legacy form and cannot be used with this API"
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

I‚Äôm currently working with SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition, and we‚Äôre facing an issue when trying to connect a form (in this case, a custom one, but we also tested with standard forms) to a custom plant control system (MES system).

When triggering the process, we get the following error message:

‚ÄúForm: YY1_PP_ETIQUETAFABRICACION is a legacy form and cannot be used with this API.‚Äù

see attached screenshot for details:

Stardard FormCustom Form

 

 

 

 

We would like to understand:

  • Are we possibly using the wrong API for this scenario?

  • Is there a way to adapt or convert the form type so that it can be used?

  • Is this limitation expected for forms of this kind in Public Cloud?

Any insights, documentation links, or experiences with similar cases would be greatly appreciated.

Thank you in advance for your help!

Best regards,

ASG.

#S4HANACloud #SAPPublicCloud #SAPForms #ABAPCloud #SAPIntegration #SAPAPI #MESIntegration #SAPBTP #BusinessTechnologyPlatform #FormsService #S4HANA #SAPCommunity

entry.title: Creating a BP (Customer Role) and Associating a Company
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

I‚Äôm currently working on a project where I need to create a Business Partner in SAP and assign the Customer role (ZFLCU0) to it. I have the code working for these parts, but I‚Äôm struggling with the last step ‚Äî associating a company to the Business Partner.

Here is the code I have so far, which is functional:

ls_central-SEARCHTERM1 = customer-name1.
ls_central-PARTNERTYPE = 'GE00'.
APPEND ls_central TO lt_central.

" Create Business Partner
CALL FUNCTION 'BAPI_BUPA_CREATE_FROM_DATA'
  EXPORTING
    partnercategory = '1'
    centraldata = ls_central
  IMPORTING
    business_partner = lv_bpartner
  TABLES
    return = lt_return.

" Assign Customer Role (ZFLCU0)
CALL FUNCTION 'BAPI_BUPA_ROLE_ADD'
  EXPORTING
    businesspartner = lv_bpartner
    businesspartnerrole = 'ZFLCU0'
  TABLES
    return = lt_return.

" Commit creation and changes
CALL FUNCTION 'BAPI_TRANSACTION_COMMIT'
  EXPORTING
    wait = abap_true.

Thanks in advance for your help!
